# Gradle files
.gradle/
build/
**/build/

# Local configuration file (sdk path, etc)
local.properties

# Log files
*.log

# Android Studio
.idea/
*.iml
*.ipr
*.iws
.idea/caches
.idea/libraries
.idea/modules.xml
.idea/workspace.xml
.idea/navEditor.xml
.idea/assetWizardSettings.xml

# Keystore files
*.jks
*.keystore

# OS files
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db

# Kotlin/Java
*.class
*.jar
*.war
*.ear

# Generated files
captures/
outputs/
*.apk
*.ap_
*.dex

# Others
*.tmp
*.bak
*.swp
*.~*
